verbs.description: When talks with North Korea [V: were] first scheduled , Trump hinted he should receive a Nobel . When asked by a reporter , “ Do you deserve the Nobel Prize , ” Trump responded " Everyone thinks so , but I would never say it . " I think he said it . That ’s the way ...
